name: Agilent Technologies, Inc.
description: Agilent Technologies, Inc. is a global leader in life sciences, diagnostics, and applied chemical markets. Established in 1999 as a spin-off from Hewlett-Packard, Agilent offers a comprehensive portfolio of products and services that enable scientists and researchers to achieve their goals in laboratories around the world. With a focus on innovation, Agilent provides advanced analytical instruments, software, and consumables that cater to a wide range of industries including pharmaceuticals, biotechnology, environmental testing, and food safety. Their flagship products include high-performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) systems, mass spectrometers, and molecular spectroscopy equipment. Agilent is committed to supporting the scientific community through continuous investment in research and development, ensuring that they stay at the forefront of technological advancements. Furthermore, the company's solutions facilitate the development of new diagnostics and therapeutics, contributing significantly to improving public health and safety. Agilent’s mission is to provide the highest-quality tools and services to enable customer success and to foster innovation in the fields of science and technology, ultimately enhancing the quality of life.

key_executives.name: M. David H. B. H. P. C. M. Chen

seo.meta_title: Agilent Technologies, Inc. | Life Sciences and Diagnostics Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Agilent Technologies, Inc., a leader in life sciences, diagnostics, and applied chemical markets. Discover innovative products and solutions for scientific research.

faq.question: What does Agilent Technologies specialize in?
faq.answer: Agilent Technologies specializes in life sciences, diagnostics, and applied chemical markets, providing analytical instruments and laboratory solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Agilent Technologies?
faq.answer: Mike McMullen is the CEO of Agilent Technologies, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Agilent headquartered?
faq.answer: Agilent is headquartered in Santa Clara, California, USA.

faq.question: What are Agilent's main products?
faq.answer: Agilent's main products include analytical instruments like HPLC systems, mass spectrometers, and various laboratory consumables.
